scene_description_enriched: A friar, identified by his habit and stigmata on his hands, kneels in prayer. Above him, Christ is depicted on a cross, with stylized orange wings emanating from the cross. The friar has a golden halo, indicating sainthood. In the background, a rocky landscape is visible, with a small, hooded figure peeking from behind a hill. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
